ValidationRule.description: When set up status is client does not want service, you must update the notes section
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: ISPICKVAL( Set_Up_Status__c , "Client did not want service")&& ISBLANK( Setup_Status_Notes__c )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: If the Set Up Status is "client does not want service", you must update the Set up status notes with the reason.
